name: The Dark Forest and the Memories of Harvest, of One Autumn's Days
name_original: The Dark Forest and the Memories of Harvest, of One Autumn's Days
description:
Reminisce.

I’d recommend the Windows build, as the framerate can get a bit choppy in the web build.

Controls

Move with WASD, harvest and interact with E. Left shift to speed up, left control to "crouch".

If you need to increase/decrease the mouse sensitivity you can do it with K(decrease)/L(increase).

(If you somehow get stuck on some geometry, press O to unstuck)
